text: Harley Jane Kozak (born 28 January 1957) is an American actress and book writer. She starred in movies like Parenthood and All I Want for Christmas. She played various characters in the CBS soap Guiding Light. Kozak was born in Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania. She was raised in Nebraska. ==References== Category:Actors from Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:1957 births Category:Living people
title: Harley Jane Kozak
